name: BrainScope Company
overview: The BrainScope Company, Inc., is a privately held health technology company that is developing a new generation of hand-held, simple-to- use, non-invasive instruments to aid medical professionals in rapidly, accurately, and objectively assessing brain function at the initial point of care. BrainScope devices in development are based on a revolutionary and proprietary technology platform, which integrates databases of brainwave recordings with advanced developments in Digital Signal Processing (DSP), sophisticated linear and non-linear algorithms, miniaturized hardware, and disposable headset sensors.

milestones.description: BrainScope® Awarded $2.67 Million U.S. Army Rapid Innovation Fund Research Contract
milestones.source_description: BrainScope® Awarded $2.67 Million U.S. Army Rapid Innovation Fund Research Contract
